data.text: @QuintusCurtius Don't always agree with him but I'm leaning towards removing Putin. Would the world be a better place? Maybe. I thought Putin was only world leader 'against the system' but he too has his own world system. Forceably removing a democratic govt is a cause worth fighting against.
@jakpant03 @QuintusCurtius He doesn't even do it properly.

@QuintusCurtius Once, I thought he was so smort! Brilliant! Then COVID and this. He turned out to be just another nibbler.

Now, I dismiss his books, and thinking, out-of-hand.
@CharlesTalleyr5 @QuintusCurtius They were never his ideas... He ripped off ancient wisdom and sold it as his own. A true con man.

@QuintusCurtius “If Putin is crazy, he will use nuclear weapons anyway.”

Crazy = nukes? 

Is this an established scientific fact? 

Might not mental illness manifest in any number of other ways? 

Prior to the invention of nukes mankind had crazy rulers. Some of them just locked themselves away
@QuintusCurtius It's because he is guided by a supreme knowledge of mathematics. That may have served him well thus far, but as soon virtues and not math are needed he falls painfully short.
@QuintusCurtius Deadlifts while overweight make a soldier
@QuintusCurtius He's become a parody of everything he said he opposed.
